alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 2:36PM EDT until May 14 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lenawee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 236 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Adrian, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Adrian around 245 PM EDT. Tecumseh around 300 PM EDT. Britton around 325 PM EDT. Deerfield around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ridgeway, Palmyra, Tipton and Holloway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
